text: Zachary John Quinto (; born June 2, 1977) is an American actor and movie producer. He is known for his roles as Sylar on the science fiction drama series Heroes (2006â€“2010) and Spock in the reboot Star Trek (2009) and its sequels Star Trek Into Darkness (2013) and Star Trek Beyond (2016).
